name: Boom Boom Tower
detailed_description:
Boom Boom Tower is a casual skill game where you have to protect your tower from various enemies equipped with different qualities.
To protect your tower, you have various abilities to defend against hordes of enemies. Use them wisely to achieve greatness score and proclaim yourself as the tower master!
The game is designed to help players improve their eye-hand coordination, and become better in various games such as MOBAs, RTS, FPS, etc. you will train specifically the following areas:

    • Eye-hand coordination
    • Mouse aim accuracy
    • Faster Reflexes
    • Decision-making skills
    • Focus during critical moments

      Have fun with Boom Boom Tower as you challenge yourself while you give your spare time a threat.
      Start playing now! Greatness awaits!
